title: Is that possible, that Internet shutdown globally for live 2-3 days, who has the power to make it happen? - Quora

response.answer_text: > Is that possible, that Internet shutdown globally for live 2-3 days, Yes. > who has the power to make it happen? The Sun.  A tech-destroying solar flare could hit Earth within 100 years It is believed that a solar superflare, if it were to occur, could knock out majority of our electronic devices and communications. That includes the internet. The last one occured in 1859, and managed to knock out telegraph systems. Solar storm of 1859 - Wikipedia

As Victor stated… No single human - or country for that matter.. has the ability to shut down th whole internet for days. The only (extremely unlikely) possibility, from our solar system - would be a ‘hit’ from a Coronal Mass Ejection (or CME). Outside the solar system - it would have to be a gamma-ray burst - aimed ‘just right’.
